General.Name: CS BEARING Co.Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: CS Bearing Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures bearings for plants and wind power generation facilities in South Korea. The company provides slewing ring, pitch, and yaw bearings. Its products are used in harbor and shipyard cranes, construction equipment, mobile cranes, offshore technology, tower cranes, man lifts, wind turbines, wind energy systems, antennas, etc. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Haman-myeon, South Korea.
